This time, it didnâ€™t merge, instead a complex design, a mix of the egg shape, maybe some trigram lines, and a very stylised Lotus flower, appeared imprinted on my skin, glowing faintly for a moment before settling into a permanent, non-luminous mark.

With a soft *poof*, the duplicate disappeared. Not gone, I could feel her essence, like part of me, but not physically present. Guess thatâ€™s the storage function?

Around me, people were walking and talking. Most wore simple, somewhat rustic clothes, but some were more elaborately dressed, and a fewâ€¦ okay, quite a few of them had glowing gems or strange marks on their hands, same as the one I just got. Ah, the Masters.

NPCs too. I could tell by their faces, their slightly more generic yet incredibly life-like movements compared to the Masters.

I took another deep breath. Still felt just as real.

Right. Game time.

Now, where to go first?
